fields.description:
Description:
There is no speech bubble rendered on the rows in the tableview


Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS on device
2) Navigate to Base UI>Views>Table Views>Refresh Table View OR Base UI>Views>Table Views>Table View Scroll Indicators

Result:
No icons rendered in tableview

Expected:
Speech bubble icons
fields.summary: Android: TableView: v8 only: No "speech bubble" icon rendered in tableviews
fields.environment: SDK 1.8.0 8911fc4, Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.7.201111061615, Nexus S (2.3.6), Galaxy 10.1 Tab (3.1) v8 compiler

comments.body:
Tested with Mobile SDK 1.8.0.1.v20111116130058
Ti Studio 1.0.7.201111151932
on Droid 1 OS 2.2.2, Droid 3 OS 2.3.4, and Xoom OS 3.2.1
OSX Lion

Results
No icons rendered in tableview
Verified fixed with 1.8.0.1.v20111123153457 on Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1 (3.1), Nexus S (2.3.4), and Droid 1 (2.2.2). Using both KS tests and both compilers.
